Title: 41156 - # Tips for Purchasing Earphones
Direction: 675 words. Consumers have a lot of choices for earphones these days. With the market flooded by earphones with a range of different features, at various price points, it’s hard to decide which pair suits you best. Help demystify the purchase process for readers by offering 4-8 tips about things they should look for when purchasing headphones. Looking for earphones that cancel external sound, so users can play music softer with greater clarity to protect their hearing, should be one of the tips so you can easily incorporate the client link. Your target audience is interested in information about tech and gadgets. Make sure you try to naturally link to other products throughout the article, as long as they are not competitors of Sony.
Anchor Text: sound canceling earbuds branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: Sony's sound canceling earbuds to protect hearing
